building the performance so Intel made an initial investment in 20 2016 2017

2 was the submission for ML perf on training and inference and you know you

workloads whereas gy as a dedicated AI accelerator is built specifically for AI

one more thing that really is a great differentiator in gudy is is part of the hardware architecture we provide two
things one is uh 96 gigabytes of onboard on card hbm memory and for those in the
audience that really know about training and inference you having that local hbm memory is critical for storing your your
weights or your parameters the things that actually are stored when you're actually running the inference or running the training th so having that
large hbm memory allows you to do one of two things you can either run a larger
model on a single card or you're more efficient as you scale out to more cards
and the other thing that really is a key differentiator for gouty is the onboard networking so on die gouty offers
24 100 GB ethernet ports so instead of relying on the latency of having to use
a third party network controller to scale to multiple nodes in IR rack for
example these dedicated ethernet ports allow a in some cases a direct all toall
connection for eight GES in a node or a single server and then the additional
ethernet ports then can go to the other nodes in Iraq and then scale out to a
switch to go to multiple nodes and then a full pod so what you end up with is a
virtual altto all connection which significantly improves a scalability when looking at large workloads Ben you
